::DrillBit::

"Roger that, Killfest."
He opened a commlink, on a codded channel.
"Everyone pull out and meet at the old Predicon cave, now!"

::Dollen::

He heard the coom chatter, and pulled himself out of the ruble.
"Why is it always me?" He says to himself, heading towards the 
meeting location.
